00021 #ifndef _CELFileConvertToXDA_HEADER_
00022 #define _CELFileConvertToXDA_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! file CELFileConvertToXDA.h This file contains a class to convert a CEL file to XDA format. */
00025 
00026 #include "calvin_files/converters/cel/src/CELFileConversionOptions.h"
00027 #include "calvin_files/converters/cel/src/CELFileConverterErrorCode.h"
00028 #include "calvin_files/data/src/CELData.h"
00029 //
00030 
00031 namespace affymetrix_cel_converter
00032 {
00033 
00034 /*! This class will convert a CEL file to XDA format. */
00035 class CELFileConvertToXDA
00036 {
00037 public:
00038 
00039         /*! Constructor */
00040         CELFileConvertToXDA();
00041 
00042         /*! Destructor */
00043         ~CELFileConvertToXDA();
00044 
00045         /*! Set extra parameters that are to be written to the file.
00046          *      @param params A collection of ParameterNameValueTypes to add to the file.
00047          */
00048         void SetExtraParameters(const affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueTypeVector* params) { extraParameters = params; }
00049 
00050         /*! Gets the error code for the conversion process.
00051          * @return The error code associated with the last failure.
00052          */
00053         CELFileConverterErrorCode ErrorCode() const { return errorCode; }
00054 
00055         /*! Convert the Calvin file to XDA format.
00056          * @param fileName The full path name of the CEL file.
00057          * @param newFile The name of the new CEL file.
00058          * @return True if successful.
00059          */
00060         bool ConvertCalvinFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options = NULL);
00061 
00062         /*! Convert the ASCII file to XDA format.
00063          * @param fileName The full path name of the CEL file.
00064          * @param newFile The name of the new CEL file.
00065          * @return True if successful.
00066          */
00067         bool ConvertASCIIFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options = NULL);
00068 
00069 private:
00070 
00071         /*! Extra parameters. Lifetime is not managed by this class. */
00072         const affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueTypeVector* extraParameters;
00073 
00074         /*! The error code. */
00075         CELFileConverterErrorCode errorCode;
00076 
00077         /*! Clear the class members. */
00078         void Clear();
00079 
00080         /*! Get the array type from extraParameters
00081          * @return The array type from extraParameter.  If the array type is not in the extraParameters collection
00082          * an empty string is returned.
00083          */
00084         std::string GetChipTypeFromExtraParameters();
00085 
00086 };
00087 
00088 }
00089 
00090 #endif
